features: Lightweight comfort: With lightweight fabric, an active fit, adjustable waist and less material between the legs, this skort is really comfy
Quick drying: The mesh inner short and pleated outer layer both dry really quickly to keep you comfy for longer
Optimized storage: The 360° mesh pocket, with a zipped back pocket, keeps all your essentials in place
AdvancedSkin ActiveDry: AdvancedSkin technical fabrics improve body comfort by keeping you dry, warm and protected when you need it and where you need it
Inner leg length 5": Inseam is the distance in inches or centimeters from the crotch, or fork, to the bottom of the trousers
360° mesh storage pocket system: A stretch waist belt with mesh pockets all around for maximum versatility and fast stowing on the go
